bullets.title: Usage and Special Notes
bullets.description:
1. Users are responsible for obtaining appropriate software licenses and downloads before they deploy templates.
2. Detailed system requirements for IBM Business Automation Workflow Enterprise V18 - https://www.ibm.com/software/reports/compatibility/clarity/index.html
3. IBM Knowledge Center for IBM Business Automation Workflow Enterprise V18 - https://www.ibm.com/support/knowledgecenter/en/SS8JB4_18.0.0
4. IBM Support Portal - https://www.ibm.com/support/home/
